title: Loving Hut - Titikaka
typeOfFood: Vegan, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Peruvian
description: Vegan eatery behind the closed coliceo on Lake Titicaca. Previously operated as Sol Salud-Super Vegan, now it's part of the international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, and advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Also sells some vegan food stuff.
